item.title: Small Business Idea: Project Pegasus: 'What If' Predictive Visualizer for Small Businesses
item.content:encoded:
The Indie CEO's Crystal Ball: Your One-Day 'What If' Business Projector

Indie software developers, gather 'round. For this year's annual deep dive, we're cutting through the noise to deliver an idea that puts serious predictive power into the hands of any small business owner, without them needing to become a data scientist. Your mission, should you choose to accept it, is to build a minimal, yet profound, tool that will change how solopreneurs and small teams make critical decisions.

Brief Description of the Idea

Imagine a web-based tool that allows a small business owner to upload their historical revenue data, automatically projects their future based on simple AI-driven trend analysis, and then empowers them to instantly visualize
